dct_alternative_sm: Nova Provinciæ tabula, ad usum serenissimi Burgundiæ Ducis
dct_description_sm: par son tres humble et tres obeissant serviteur I. Jaillot.
3 bar scales on map, given in "Mille Pas Geometriques," "Lieües de Provence," and "Lieües Communes de Languedoc."
Decorative cartouches with flora and fauna, including unicorn.
Compass rose, latitudinal and longitudinal lines.
"Presenté a Monseigneur le Duc de Bourgogne."
Map first appeared in 1707; later published by R. & J. Ottens.
